class="excerpt entry-summary"><p>WASHINGTON—In an effort to make the frequent festivities for departing staffers more efficient, White House officials announced Tuesday that the administration is now just holding one continuous going-away party. “Instead of throwing a send-off celebration for Rob Porter and Rick Dearborn only to turn around and do it…<span class="meta--pe secondary-byline"><a  href="//www.theonion.com/c/news" class="storytype-label js_storytype-type ">News</a></div><header><h1 class="headline entry-title js_entry-title"><a onclick="" href="https://www.theonion.com/ra-wins-westminster-god-show-1822961049" class="js_entry-link">Ra Wins Westminster God Show<em></em></a></h1><div class="meta--pe "><div class="meta__container "><time class="meta__time updated" datetime="2018-02-13T14:00:00-06:00"><a onclick="" href="https://www.theonion.com/ra-wins-westminster-god-show-1822961049" class="js_entry-link js_publish_time" id="dropdown-1822961049" class="f-dropdown proxima js_post-dropdown js_follow-controls js_user-follow-controls whitelisted-links" data-postid="1822961049" data-starterid="1822961049" data-authorid="5876237249237757547" data-blogid="1636428242" data-sourceblogid="1636079510" data-dropdown-content><li class="js_edit-post hover-icon hide readonly-hide"><a href="#" rel="nofollow" /></svg>Promote</a></li><li class="js_go-to-permalink"><a class="hover-icon icon--svg u-darkened--onhover u-prepended" href="https://www.theonion.com/ra-wins-westminster-god-show-1822961049" href="https://www.theonion.com/ra-wins-westminster-god-show-1822961049"onclick="" ><div style="padding-bottom: 56.65%"class="img-wrapper   lazy-image "><picture><source data-srcset="https://i.kinja-img.com/gawker-media/image/upload/s--CKfevgUN--/c_fit,fl_progressive,q_80,w_636/d3xbukhnz6jydywlrgov.jpg" media="--small" /><source data-srcset="https://i.kinja-img.com/gawker-media/image/upload/s--CKfevgUN--/c_fit,fl_progressive,q_80,w_636/d3xbukhnz6jydywlrgov.jpg" media="--medium" /><source data-srcset="https://i.kinja-img.com/gawker-media/image/upload/s--_F98hl30--/c_scale,fl_progressive,q_80,w_800/d3xbukhnz6jydywlrgov.jpg" /><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAAAACH5BAEKAAEALAAAAAABAAEAAAICTAEAOw=="class="lazyload" data-sizes="auto" /></picture></div></a></figure><div class="excerpt entry-summary"><p>NEW YORK—Commending his healthy frame, impeccable lineage, and ability to form light and order from the primordial chaos, judges announced Thursday that Egyptian deity Ra has taken top honors at the 141st annual Westminster God Show.<span class="read-more-placeholder"></span></p></div></div></article></div><div class="post-wrapper js_post-wrapper  streamshare"  ><article class="postlist__item js_post_item status-published post-item-frontpage" data-id="1822969581" id="post_1822969581" data-model="%7B%22id%22%3A1822969581%2C%22isBlip%22%3Afalse%2C%22authorBlogId%22%3A1636428242%2C%22authorId%22%3A%225876237249237757547%22%2C%22authorIds%22%3A%5B%225876237249237757547%22%5D%2C%22defaultBlogId%22%3A1636408940%2C%22contentType%22%3A%22Media%22%2C%22sharedPostId%22%3Anull%2C%22parentId%22%3Anull%2C%22parentAuthorId%22%3Anull%2C%22starterId%22%3A1822969581%2C%22status%22%3A%22PUBLISHED%22%2C%22sharedToBlogId%22%3A1636079510%7D"><div class="meta--pe secondary-byline"><a  href="//www.theonion.com/c/news-in-brief" class="storytype-label js_storytype-type ">News in Brief</a><div class="meta__text"><svg class="svg-icon small svg-sharedpost--small"><use xlink:href="#iconset-sharedpost--small" /></svg> Shared from Politics</div></div><header><h1 class="headline entry-title js_entry-title"><a onclick="" href="https://politics.theonion.com/congress-confused-by-500-million-in-trump-s-budget-all-1822969581" class="js_entry-link">Congress Confused By $500 Million In Trump’s Budget Allocated For ‘Laser Stuff’<em></em></a></h1><div class="meta--pe "><div class="meta__container "><time class="meta__time updated" datetime="2018-02-13T13:34:00-06:00"><a onclick="" href="https://politics.theonion.com/congress-confused-by-500-million-in-trump-s-budget-all-1822969581" class="js_entry-link js_publish_time" target="_self" title="2/13/18 1:34pm" >Yesterday 1:39pm</a></time></div><div class="meta__right"><div class="meta__tools js_meta-tools post-dropdown-ct js_post-dropdown-ct"><ul id="dropdown-1822969581" class="f-dropdown proxima js_post-dropdown js_follow-controls js_user-follow-controls whitelisted-links" data-postid="1822969581" data-starterid="1822969581" data-authorid="5876237249237757547" data-blogid="1636428242" “laser stuff” in fiscal year 2019. “While I agree with many of the president’s recommendations, like his…<span class="read-more-placeholder"></span></p></div></div></article></div><div class="item__content js_item-content item__content--thumb"><figure class="asset main-media fullwidth-for-small js_main-mediafigure "><a href="https://politics.theonion.com/trump-announces-plan-to-replace-food-stamps-with-new-lo-1822967010"onclick="" ><div class="img-wrapper img--16x9  lazy-image "><picture><source data-srcset="https://i.kinja-img.com/gawker-media/image/upload/s--61oVAIIX--/c_fill,fl_progressive,g_center,h_180,q_80,w_320/jbv7etjjneabvhm4svf3.jpg" /><img entry-summary"><p>WASHINGTON—Championing the decision as a way to cut costs and still meet federally mandated nutrition requirements, President Trump announced a plan Tuesday to replace food stamps with a new low-income foraging program. “We have developed a new foraging-based plan that provides qualifying Americans with a small,…<span class="read-more-placeholder"></span></p></div></div></article></div><div class="post-wrapper js_post-wrapper "  ><article class="postlist__item js_post_item status-published post-item-frontpage" data-id="1822962125" id="post_1822962125" data-model="%7B%22id%22%3A1822962125%2C%22isBlip%22%3Afalse%2C%22authorBlogId%22%3A1636428242%2C%22authorId%22%3A%225876237249237757547%22%2C%22authorIds%22%3A%5B%225876237249237757547%22%5D%2C%22defaultBlogId%22%3A1636079510%2C%22contentType%22%3A%22Media%22%2C%22sharedPostId%22%3Anull%2C%22parentId%22%3Anull%2C%22parentAuthorId%22%3Anull%2C%22starterId%22%3A1822962125%2C%22status%22%3A%22PUBLISHED%22%7D"><div class="meta--pe secondary-byline"><a  href="//www.theonion.com/c/news-in-brief" class="storytype-label js_storytype-type ">News in Brief</a></div><header><h1 class="headline entry-title js_entry-title"><a onclick="" href="https://www.theonion.com/texas-schools-to-no-longer-teach-students-about-autoero-1822962125" class="js_entry-link">Texas Schools To No Longer Teach Students About Autoerotic Asphyxiation<em></em></a></h1><div class="meta--pe "><div class="meta__container "><time class="meta__time updated" datetime="2018-02-13T10:45:00-06:00"><a onclick="" href="https://www.theonion.com/texas-schools-to-no-longer-teach-students-about-autoero-1822962125" class="js_entry-link js_publish_time" target="_self" title="2/13/18 10:45am" >Yesterday 10:45am</a></time></div><div class="meta__right"><div class="meta__tools js_meta-tools post-dropdown-ct js_post-dropdown-ct"><ul id="dropdown-1822962125" class="f-dropdown proxima js_post-dropdown js_follow-controls js_user-follow-controls whitelisted-links" data-postid="1822962125" data-starterid="1822962125" data-authorid="5876237249237757547" data-blogid="1636428242" data-sourceblogid="1636079510" data-dropdown-content><li class="js_edit-post hover-icon hide readonly-hide"><a href="#" rel="nofollow" class="icon--svg u-darkened--onhover u-prepended"><svg class="svg-icon svg-write"><use xlink:href="#iconset-write" /></svg>Edit</a></li><li class="js_send_to_editor hover-icon hide"><a href="#" rel="nofollow" class="icon--svg u-darkened--onhover u-prepended"><svg class="svg-icon svg-mail"><use xlink:href="#iconset-mail" /></svg>Send to Editors</a></li><li class="js_promote hover-icon hide readonly-hide"><a href="#" rel="nofollow" class="js_go-to-permalink"><a class="hover-icon icon--svg u-darkened--onhover u-prepended" href="https://www.theonion.com/texas-schools-to-no-longer-teach-students-about-autoero-1822962125" href="#" target="_self" class="post-dropdown-trigger js_post-menu-toggler icon--svg u-darkened--onhover" data-dropdown="dropdown-1822962125"><svg class="svg-icon stroked svg-tools"><use xlink:href="#iconset-tools--giant" /></svg></a></div></div></div></header><div class="item__content js_item-content"><figure class="asset marquee-asset js_marquee-assetfigure "><a href="https://www.theonion.com/texas-schools-to-no-longer-teach-students-about-autoero-1822962125"onclick="" ><div style="padding-bottom: 56.65%"class="img-wrapper   lazy-image "><picture><source data-srcset="https://i.kinja-img.com/gawker-media/image/upload/s--gvZrLQgU--/c_fit,fl_progressive,q_80,w_636/f1wn7qln2zwvt4sencjr.jpg" media="--small" /><source data-srcset="https://i.kinja-img.com/gawker-media/image/upload/s--gvZrLQgU--/c_fit,fl_progressive,q_80,w_636/f1wn7qln2zwvt4sencjr.jpg" media="--medium" /><source data-srcset="https://i.kinja-img.com/gawker-media/image/upload/s--HcbpDp3N--/c_scale,fl_progressive,q_80,w_800/f1wn7qln2zwvt4sencjr.jpg" /><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAAAACH5BAEKAAEALAAAAAABAAEAAAICTAEAOw=="class="lazyload" data-sizes="auto" /></picture></div></a></figure><div class="excerpt entry-summary"><p>AUSTIN, TX—In a landmark overhaul of traditional curriculum standards, the Texas State Board of Education voted Tuesday in favor of a legislative recommendation that public high schools no longer require teachers to include autoerotic asphyxiation in their health education curriculum. “We stand firm in our belief that…<span class="read-more-placeholder"></span></p></div></div></article></div><div class="post-wrapper js_post-wrapper "  ><article class="postlist__item js_post_item status-published post-item-frontpage" data-id="1822960915" id="post_1822960915" data-model="%7B%22id%22%3A1822960915%2C%22isBlip%22%3Afalse%2C%22authorBlogId%22%3A1636428242%2C%22authorId%22%3A%225876237249237757547%22%2C%22authorIds%22%3A%5B%225876237249237757547%22%5D%2C%22defaultBlogId%22%3A1636079510%2C%22contentType%22%3A%22Media%22%2C%22sharedPostId%22%3Anull%2C%22parentId%22%3Anull%2C%22parentAuthorId%22%3Anull%2C%22starterId%22%3A1822960915%2C%22status%22%3A%22PUBLISHED%22%7D"><div class="meta--pe secondary-byline"><a  href="//www.theonion.com/c/infographic" class="storytype-label js_storytype-type ">Infographic</a></div><header><h1 class="headline entry-title js_entry-title"><a onclick="" href="https://www.theonion.com/timeline-of-the-u-s-labor-movement-1822960915" class="js_entry-link">Timeline Of The U.S. Labor Movement<em></em></a></h1><div class="meta--pe "><div class="meta__container "><time class="meta__time updated" datetime="2018-02-13T10:11:00-06:00"><a onclick="" href="https://www.theonion.com/timeline-of-the-u-s-labor-movement-1822960915" class="js_entry-link js_publish_time" target="_self" title="2/13/18 10:11am" >Yesterday 10:11am</a></time></div><div class="meta__right"><div class="meta__tools js_meta-tools post-dropdown-ct js_post-dropdown-ct"><ul id="dropdown-1822960915" class="f-dropdown proxima js_post-dropdown js_follow-controls js_user-follow-controls whitelisted-links" data-postid="1822960915" data-starterid="1822960915" data-authorid="5876237249237757547" data-blogid="1636428242" data-sourceblogid="1636079510" data-dropdown-content><li class="js_edit-post hover-icon hide readonly-hide"><a href="#" rel="nofollow" class="icon--svg u-darkened--onhover u-prepended"><svg class="svg-icon svg-write"><use xlink:href="#iconset-write" /></svg>Edit</a></li><li class="js_send_to_editor hover-icon hide"><a href="#" rel="nofollow" class="icon--svg u-darkened--onhover u-prepended"><svg class="svg-icon svg-mail"><use xlink:href="#iconset-mail" /></svg>Send to Editors</a></li><li class="js_promote hover-icon hide readonly-hide"><a href="#" rel="nofollow" class="icon--svg u-darkened--onhover u-prepended"><svg class="svg-icon svg-icon--filled svg-star-circle"><use xlink:href="#iconset-star-circle" /></svg>Promote</a></li><li class="js_go-to-permalink"><a class="hover-icon icon--svg u-darkened--onhover u-prepended" href="https://www.theonion.com/timeline-of-the-u-s-labor-movement-1822960915" onclick="window.ga('send', 'event', 'Group Chats', 'Drop down - Go to permalink click');"><svg class="svg-icon svg-link"><use xlink:href="#iconset-link" /></svg>Go to permalink</a></li></ul><a href="#" target="_self" class="post-dropdown-trigger js_post-menu-toggler icon--svg u-darkened--onhover" data-dropdown="dropdown-1822960915"><svg class="svg-icon stroked svg-tools"><use xlink:href="#iconset-tools--giant" /></svg></a></div></div></div></header><div class="item__content js_item-content item__content--thumb"><figure class="asset main-media fullwidth-for-small js_main-mediafigure "><a href="https://www.theonion.com/timeline-of-the-u-s-labor-movement-1822960915"onclick="" ><div class="img-wrapper img--16x9  lazy-image "><picture><source data-srcset="https://i.kinja-img.com/gawker-media/image/upload/s--eSoo2SG7--/c_fill,fl_progressive,g_center,h_358,q_80,w_636/ms6hik3ia0xqkrex0y2m.jpg" media="--small" /><source data-srcset="https://i.kinja-img.com/gawker-media/image/upload/s--ZUXyKT9g--/c_fill,fl_progressive,g_center,h_180,q_80,w_320/ms6hik3ia0xqkrex0y2m.jpg" /><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAAAACH5BAEKAAEALAAAAAABAAEAAAICTAEAOw=="class="lazyload" data-sizes="auto" /></picture></div></a></figure><div class="excerpt entry-summary"><p>As union membership declines, the gig economy continues to grow, and automation becomes an increasing priority, the labor rights movement in the U.S. faces stiff challenges. <em>The Onion</em> presents a timeline of key events in the labor rights movement.<span class="read-more-placeholder"></span></p></div></div></article></div><div class="post-wrapper js_post-wrapper "  ><article class="postlist__item js_post_item status-published post-item-frontpage" data-id="1822960144" id="post_1822960144" data-model="%7B%22id%22%3A1822960144%2C%22isBlip%22%3Afalse%2C%22authorBlogId%22%3A1636428242%2C%22authorId%22%3A%225876237249237757547%22%2C%22authorIds%22%3A%5B%225876237249237757547%22%5D%2C%22defaultBlogId%22%3A1636079510%2C%22contentType%22%3A%22Text%20only%22%2C%22sharedPostId%22%3Anull%2C%22parentId%22%3Anull%2C%22parentAuthorId%22%3Anull%2C%22starterId%22%3A1822960144%2C%22status%22%3A%22PUBLISHED%22%7D"><div class="meta--pe secondary-byline"><a  href="//www.theonion.com/c/american-voices" class="storytype-label js_storytype-type ">American Voices</a></div><header><h1 class="headline entry-title js_entry-title"><a onclick="" href="https://www.theonion.com/l-l-bean-ends-iconic-lifetime-return-policy-1822960144" class="js_entry-link">L.L. Bean Ends Iconic Lifetime Return Policy<em></em></a></h1><div class="meta--pe "><div class="meta__container "><time class="meta__time updated" datetime="2018-02-13T09:41:00-06:00"><a onclick="" href="https://www.theonion.com/l-l-bean-ends-iconic-lifetime-return-policy-1822960144" class="js_entry-link js_publish_time" target="_self" title="2/13/18 9:41am" >Yesterday 9:41am</a></time></div><div class="meta__right"><div class="meta__tools js_meta-tools post-dropdown-ct js_post-dropdown-ct"><ul id="dropdown-1822960144" class="f-dropdown proxima js_post-dropdown js_follow-controls js_user-follow-controls whitelisted-links" data-postid="1822960144" data-starterid="1822960144" data-authorid="5876237249237757547" data-blogid="1636428242" data-sourceblogid="1636079510" data-dropdown-content><li class="js_edit-post hover-icon hide readonly-hide"><a href="#" rel="nofollow" class="icon--svg u-darkened--onhover u-prepended"><svg class="svg-icon svg-write"><use xlink:href="#iconset-write" /></svg>Edit</a></li><li class="js_send_to_editor hover-icon hide"><a href="#" rel="nofollow" class="icon--svg u-darkened--onhover u-prepended"><svg class="svg-icon svg-mail"><use xlink:href="#iconset-mail" /></svg>Send to Editors</a></li><li class="js_promote hover-icon hide readonly-hide"><a href="#" rel="nofollow" class="icon--svg u-darkened--onhover u-prepended"><svg class="svg-icon svg-icon--filled svg-star-circle"><use xlink:href="#iconset-star-circle" /></svg>Promote</a></li><li class="js_go-to-permalink"><a class="hover-icon icon--svg u-darkened--onhover u-prepended" href="https://www.theonion.com/l-l-bean-ends-iconic-lifetime-return-policy-1822960144" onclick="window.ga('send', 'event', 'Group Chats', 'Drop down - Go to permalink click');"><svg class="svg-icon svg-link"><use xlink:href="#iconset-link" /></svg>Go to permalink</a></li></ul><a href="#" target="_self" class="post-dropdown-trigger js_post-menu-toggler icon--svg u-darkened--onhover" data-dropdown="dropdown-1822960144"><svg class="svg-icon stroked svg-tools"><use xlink:href="#iconset-tools--giant" /></svg></a></div></div></div></header><div class="item__content js_item-content item__content--thumb"><figure class="asset main-media fullwidth-for-small js_main-mediafigure "><a href="https://www.theonion.com/l-l-bean-ends-iconic-lifetime-return-policy-1822960144"onclick="" ><div class="img-wrapper img--16x9  lazy-image "><picture><source data-srcset="https://i.kinja-img.com/gawker-media/image/upload/s--dK27ugLO--/c_fill,fl_progressive,g_center,h_358,q_80,w_636/q4wdcplrlrfmtkprjnfi.jpg" media="--small" /><source data-srcset="https://i.kinja-img.com/gawker-media/image/upload/s--j2p_Uwti--/c_fill,fl_progressive,g_center,h_180,q_80,w_320/q4wdcplrlrfmtkprjnfi.jpg" /><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAAAACH5BAEKAAEALAAAAAABAAEAAAICTAEAOw=="class="lazyload" data-sizes="auto" /></picture></div></a></figure><div class="excerpt entry-summary"><p>In a message to patrons, L.L. Bean announced that it would end its long-standing policy of guaranteeing products for life, citing modern business demands and customers exploiting loopholes in the plan. What do <em>you</em> think?<span class="read-more-placeholder"></span></p></div></div></article></div><div class="post-wrapper js_post-wrapper "  ><article class="postlist__item js_post_item status-published post-item-frontpage" data-id="1822346834" id="post_1822346834" data-model="%7B%22id%22%3A1822346834%2C%22isBlip%22%3Afalse%2C%22authorBlogId%22%3A481758003%2C%22authorId%22%3A%22481757999%22%2C%22authorIds%22%3A%5B%22481757999%22%5D%2C%22defaultBlogId%22%3A1636079510%2C%22contentType%22%3A%22Media%22%2C%22sharedPostId%22%3Anull%2C%22parentId%22%3Anull%2C%22parentAuthorId%22%3Anull%2C%22starterId%22%3A1822346834%2C%22status%22%3A%22PUBLISHED%22%7D"><div class="meta--pe secondary-byline"><a  href="//www.theonion.com/c/a-very-fatal-murder" class="storytype-label js_storytype-type ">A Very Fatal Murder</a></div><header><h1 class="headline entry-title js_entry-title"><a onclick="" href="https://www.theonion.com/episode-2-what-i-know-and-what-i-don-t-know-yet-1822346834" class="js_entry-link">Episode 2: What I Know And What I Don’t Know Yet<em></em></a></h1><div class="meta--pe "><div class="meta__container "><time class="meta__time updated" datetime="2018-02-12T14:19:00-06:00"><a onclick="" href="https://www.theonion.com/episode-2-what-i-know-and-what-i-don-t-know-yet-1822346834" class="js_entry-link js_publish_time" target="_self" title="2/12/18 2:19pm" >Monday js_follow-controls js_user-follow-controls whitelisted-links" data-postid="1822346834" data-starterid="1822346834" data-authorid="481757999" data-blogid="481758003" data-sourceblogid="1636079510" data-dropdown-content><li class="js_edit-post hover-icon hide readonly-hide"><a href="#" rel="nofollow" class="icon--svg u-darkened--onhover u-prepended"><svg class="svg-icon svg-write"><use xlink:href="#iconset-write" /></svg>Edit</a></li><li class="js_send_to_editor hover-icon hide"><a href="#" rel="nofollow" class="icon--svg u-darkened--onhover u-prepended"><svg class="svg-icon class="item__content js_item-content item__content--thumb"><figure class="asset main-media fullwidth-for-small js_main-mediafigure "><a href="https://www.theonion.com/episode-2-what-i-know-and-what-i-don-t-know-yet-1822346834"onclick="" ><div class="img-wrapper img--16x9  lazy-image "><picture><source data-srcset="https://i.kinja-img.com/gawker-media/image/upload/s--6Exyi7cb--/c_fill,fl_progressive,g_center,h_358,q_80,w_636/gjy2w0qol7iduuwxcoqq.jpg" media="--small" /><source data-srcset="https://i.kinja-img.com/gawker-media/image/upload/s--5ac_Jrk6--/c_fill,fl_progressive,g_center,h_180,q_80,w_320/gjy2w0qol7iduuwxcoqq.jpg" /><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAAAACH5BAEKAAEALAAAAAABAAEAAAICTAEAOw=="class="lazyload" data-sizes="auto" /></picture></div></a></figure><div class="excerpt entry-summary"><p>In the second episode of “A Very Fatal Murder,” David conducts preliminary interviews with those connected to the murder of Hayley Price, including chief of police Charlie Jameson and Hayley’s boyfriend Bryan, who is really hot but also––like––<em>interesting</em>––which is so hard to find in someone these days––as well as the…<span class="read-more-placeholder"></span></p></div></div></article><div TX—Claiming the common-sense measure would save untold lives, mayors from 37 major American cities issued statements Thursday in favor of outlawing hollow-point silver bullets after the latest wave of Alert Owner Of Neighbor’s Murder They Witnessed Through Window<em></em></a></h1><div class="meta--pe "><div class="meta__container "><time class="meta__time updated" js_main-mediafigure "><a href="https://www.theonion.com/study-finds-cats-only-meow-when-they-want-to-alert-owne-1822931276"onclick="" ><div class="img-wrapper img--16x9  lazy-image "><picture><source data-srcset="https://i.kinja-img.com/gawker-media/image/upload/s--at8CN4SO--/c_fill,fl_progressive,g_center,h_180,q_80,w_320/waregaugpfpr0z5i6ck8.jpg" /><img study published this week in the journal Animal Behaviour revealed that house cats only meow when they want to alert their owners that they just witnessed a neighbor’s murder while looking out a window. “Through direct observation and analysis of feline vocal patterns, we were able to confirm that the…<span class="read-more-placeholder"></span></p></div></div></article></div><div href="https://local.theonion.com/report-whoa-last-person-on-treadmill-ran-8-miles-1822931058"onclick="" ><div style="padding-bottom: 75.8%"class="img-wrapper   lazy-image "><picture><source href="https://local.theonion.com/detective-refuses-to-pry-into-circumstances-of-murder-o-1822930933" class="js_entry-link">Detective Refuses To Pry Into Circumstances Of Murder Out Of Respect For Deceased<em></em></a></h1><div class="meta--pe "><div class="meta__container "><time class="meta__time updated" datetime="2018-02-12T12:14:00-06:00"><a onclick="" href="https://local.theonion.com/detective-refuses-to-pry-into-circumstances-of-murder-o-1822930933" class="js_entry-link js_publish_time" target="_self" title="2/12/18 12:14pm" >Monday 12:16pm</a></time></div><div class="meta__right"><div class="meta__tools js_meta-tools post-dropdown-ct js_post-dropdown-ct"><ul id="dropdown-1822930933" class="f-dropdown proxima js_post-dropdown class="item__content js_item-content item__content--thumb"><figure class="asset main-media fullwidth-for-small js_main-mediafigure "><a href="https://local.theonion.com/detective-refuses-to-pry-into-circumstances-of-murder-o-1822930933"onclick="" ><div class="img-wrapper img--16x9  lazy-image "><picture><source data-srcset="https://i.kinja-img.com/gawker-media/image/upload/s--EA4Yev6t--/c_fill,fl_progressive,g_center,h_358,q_80,w_636/hawejmr3oy4vwxyowjjm.jpg" media="--small" /><source data-srcset="https://i.kinja-img.com/gawker-media/image/upload/s--HKa-HMFd--/c_fill,fl_progressive,g_center,h_180,q_80,w_320/hawejmr3oy4vwxyowjjm.jpg" /><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAAAACH5BAEKAAEALAAAAAABAAEAAAICTAEAOw=="class="lazyload" data-sizes="auto" /></picture></div></a></figure><div class="excerpt entry-summary"><p>NAMPA, ID—In an effort to provide space for the family during their time of mourning, detective James Horton reportedly refused Monday to pry into the circumstances surrounding 28-year-old Allan Lieberman’s murder out of respect for the deceased. “Due to the extremely sensitive nature of this violent incident, I have…<span class="read-more-placeholder"></span></p></div></div></article></div></div><div
